11333222122.title: An argument?

113332221222.content:
Why else could Goku and Goten want to use the Dragon Balls to swap bodies with each other?
Maybe this is why: Goten wants to participate in one of the Martial Arts Tournaments, but finds out that he is too young to participate; so to help him out, Goku decides to use the Dragon Balls to swap their bodies temporarily, allowing Goten to battle in the tournament in his father's body, while Goku-in-Goten cheers for him from the spectators seats.

However, Goten-in-Goku is not exactly used to being in his father's older, stronger and bigger body, (how can he; he's only 6 years old), so Goku has to first teach Goten how to fight like him and how to control his new strength; a task easier said than done, since Goten keeps falling over in his father's body, because he is not used to the new hight-and-depth perceptions that his father's body gives him.
Also, because of his father's body's much larger size and longer limbs, Goten keeps tripping and getting dizzy, so he first has to get used to his father's body, before any combat training begins.

1551.content:
After the events of the majin Buu saga at capsule Corp


“Bulma it’s your job to watch the kids and be the stay at home mom” said Vegetable

“Why? I’m one of the smartest people in the world and it’d be a waste”

“Because you’re a woman and weak, plus your maternal instincts make you naturally suited woman”

Frustrated bulma stormed out. “This is not how I want to live my life.” “I wish I had the power so I can use my brain for other things “

Just last week Goku told me I had to kiss elder kai tomorrow because he saved the earth she thought.

Wait maybe elder kai can help me

When bulma visited elder kai she agreed to give him a kiss if he gave him something which let her increase her power over Vegeta.

Elder Kai gave her special potara ear rings which swapped the bodies of the users permantly.

Perfect she though as she puckered up and gave elder kai the last kiss she ever would as a woman.

She had already planned to use the earrings to swap with...
1551.title: Bulma

info.brief_description: Characters from Dragonball switch bodies.You decide how.
info.description:
OH NO! Dragonball Z characters are switching bodies!
No gay/lesbian stuff or possesion stuff OK because its not really a body swap if its possesion.
No sex or deaths allowed.
Add sub characters like zarbon,bardock, and roshi.
Have fun and remember the rules! Check all characters before swapping.
